mutants.code:
def find_longest_nesting_length(nums):
    best = 1
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        if nums[i] == -1:
            continue
        current = 0
        j = i
        while nums[j] != -1:
            current += 1
            k = j
            j = nums[j]
            nums[k] = -1
        best = max(best, current)
        if n - current <= best:
            break
    return best
